name: Iso Chess Demo
description:
IsoChess is a simple chess game for new and experienced players alike.

Note: AI & Multiplayer support are only available on Steam.

Practice against a computer!
IsoChess allows you to play against an assortment of community developed chess engines. Simply find a compatible engine, and install it under the ai/ directory of the game. When creating an AI game, you can select from any of your installed engines. Stockfish, a popular open source engine, has been included out of the box. Stockfish is both a very strong player, as well as capable at playing at lower difficulties. Great for practicing and developing your chess skills.

Play against anyone!
The free / demo version of IsoChess allows joining of multiplayer games. With a paid copy of the game, you can create games to play against other owners of the game, or anyone else on Steam!

Online and Offline Multiplayer
Offline play supports human vs human games, or human vs AI games. Take chess with you, even when you will not have access to the internet.

Two Art Styles
Play either in retro isometric "2.5D", or classic top-down 2d modes. Switch between graphic styles at any time during a game.

Demo Features
- Play against the AI
- Local multiplayer (2 players on the same computer)
- Join online games (Games created by Paid copies)

Paid game features (Everything from the demo plus):
- Create multiplayer games
- Invite anyone on steam to play
- Record all your games
- Review your past games
